title: Fallout 3 The Pitt install (full)
description:
This is made by me and compressed by WinRAR I would compress it more but it may corrupt the installation. Please comment and if you can could you tell me a good compressing program =). This was done quickly in the read me folder so here is how you install

1. Open up the WinRAR folder what you have downloaded (must be 100%)
2. Click on the file called The Pitt
3. Now a screen will come up with prompts follow them
4. Install to the Data folder of you Fallout 3 program will work with a RIP game
5. Now click the Fallout 3 launcher and go Data in Data Files tick the box what  says ThePitt.esm



If it doesn't work like it says need a cd to play download the crack here:

www.thepiratebay.se/torrent/4829969

Now make sure you update Fallout 3 to v1.4.0.6 what a link will be given if you click above for the No cd crack.
